[mumbling] Well, um, I tried.

[formal] Every safety protocol I follow was written because someone, [very sincerely], somewhere made a mistake that cost, [cheerful], lives.
[friendly] Well, um, I've navigated through hurricanes but somehow, [jealous], never found my way back home. [gasp]

[playful] Um, you know, Dad kept your captain's license framed above, [animated], his workbench next to the rejection letter I got from, well, the maritime academy.
